collection_holder_name: Special Collections Department, Alderman Memorial Library, University of Virginia
pageContext.collection_title: Political Addresses, Music, Educational and Entertainment Programs
pageContext.collection_description: An audio collection of 81 discs that includes political addresses, the June 12, 1945 broadcast of American Forum of the Air, the May 17, 24 and June 21, 1945 broadcasts of Town Meeting of the Air, transcriptions of many AFRS programs and other programs. See catalog listing for more information.
